items.name: Ogre Blade
items.description: S+2 AP -1 (Armour Bane(1), Magical Attacks, Multiple Wounds (D3))
items.story: A broad and heavy blade, the Ogre Blade is, much like its namesake, an unsubtle weapon,

items.name: Sword of Battle
items.description: S+1 AP -1 (Armour Bane(1), Extra Attacks (+1), Magical Attacks)
items.story: A simple weapon, yet finely crafted, blessed by mighty mages and revered priests.

items.name: Duellist's Blades
items.description: AP -1 (Extra Attacks(+2), Magical Attacks, Requires Two Hands)
items.story: Fine weapons, forged by the greatest of swordsmiths and imbued with potent runes of quickening

items.name: Dragin Slaying Sword
items.description: Magical Attacks, Monster Slayer
items.story: A mighty blade, wielded by many great heroes in their endless quests to slay foul monsters

items.name: Headsman's Axe
items.description: S+1 AP - 1 (Killing Blow, Magical Attacks, Requires Two Hands)
items.story: A wide bladed axe, steeped in the blood of its countless helpless victims

items.name: Spelleater Axe
items.description: AP -1 (Magical Attacks, Magic Resistance(-2))
items.story: Forged of rune-encrusted brass, the Spelleater Axe is an anathma to the Winds of Magic

items.name: Giant Blade
items.description: S+1 (Armour Bane(2), Magical Attacks, Multiple Wounds(2))
items.story: A broad and heavy blade wrought with powerful enchantments that only increase the weight of its blows, the Giant Blade is an unsubtle weapon

items.name: Sword of Swiftness
items.description: Magical Attacks, Strike First
items.story: Crafted from magical attuned materials and ensorcelled to strike as if with a life of its own

items.name: Berserker Blade
items.description: S+1 (Frenzy, Magical Attacks)
items.story: Quenched in the blood of untold fallen enemies, the Beserker Blade eternally hungers for battle

items.name: Sword of Might
items.description: S+1 AP -1 Magical Attacks
items.story: Bound around with powerful runes that increase its power and enhance the strength of its bearer

items.name: Biting Blade
items.description: AP -2 (Armour Bane(1), Magical Attacks)
items.story: The serrated length of the Biting Blade cuts through armour of place and mail with terrible ease

items.name: Sword of Striking
items.description: +1 to Hit Magical Attacks
items.story: Engraved with runes of accuracy and swiftness, the Sword of Striking is an elegant weapon of great precision

items.name: Burning Blade
items.description: Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks
items.story: Once unsheathed, the cutting edge of the Burning Blade writhes endlessly with a living flame

items.name: Armour of Destiny
items.description: Heavy Armour, +4 Ward Sv.
items.story: The potent Armour of Destiny protects its wearer from all but the most grievous of harm

items.name: Bedazzling Helm
items.description: +1 Sv (max 2+) -1 to hit
items.story: A gleaming helm that confuses and confounds enemies, causing their blows to fall wide of their mark

items.name: Armour of Silvered Steel
items.description: 3+ sv (can not be improved in any way)
items.story: Polished to a mirror shine, the Armour of Silvered Steel encases its wearer from head to toe

items.name: Glittering Scales
items.description: Light Armour. Enemy re-rolls single Roll to Hit bearer
items.story: Each and every scale of this armoured surcoat is crafted from shards of precious metal

items.name: Shield of the Warrior True
items.description: Shield. 5+ ward from shooting
items.story: A heavy shield of eak and iron that turns aside all but the most deadly of missiles.

items.name: Spellshield
items.description: Shield. 5+ ward from Magic Missile, Magical Vortex or Assailment spell
items.story: The Winds of Magic lose their power when in the presence of the brass-bound Spellshield.

items.name: Armour of Meteoric Iron
items.description: 5+ sv can be improved or reduced
items.story: This heavy armour was forged of ore mined from a meteor that fell from the heavens.

items.name: Enchanted Shield
items.description: Shield. 6+ ward vs non-magical enemy attacks
items.story: A finely crafted and sturdy shield that protects its bearer from harm time and time again.

items.name: Charmed Shield
items.description: Shield. 5+ ward against single wound once per game.
items.story: A simple shield hung with charms and fetishes to bring the bearer good fortune. In the heat of battle, such ornamentation rarely survives intact for long.

items.name: 3 Obsidian Lodestones
items.description: Magic Resistance (-3)
items.story: An air of chill hangs about obsidian, stilling the Winds of Magic in its presence.

items.name: 2 Obsidian Lodestones
items.description: Magic Resistance (-2)
items.story: An air of chill hangs about obsidian, stilling the Winds of Magic in its presence.

items.name: Dawnstone
items.description: Reroll Armour Save roll of natural 1.
items.story: The magic trapped within this semi-precious stone binds together shattered armour plates

items.name: Talisman of Protection
items.description: 5+ ward sv.
items.story: A powerful magical aura surrounds this humble talisman, protecting its wearer from harm.

items.name: Paymaster's Coin
items.description: Single Use. Re-roll failed To Hit.
items.story: The heavy golden chain may not be enchanted, but its weight in its owner's pocket certainly inspires heroism.

items.name: Obsidian Lodestone
items.description: Magic Resistance (-1)
items.story: An air of chill hangs about obsidian, stilling the Winds of Magic in its presence.

items.name: Luckstone
items.description: Single Use. Re-roll single failed Armour Save roll.
items.story: Can luck be trapped within a dull stone pendant? Possibly.

items.name: Banner of Iron Resolve
items.description: Stubborn special rule.
items.story: No regiment that stands beneath the Banner of Iron Resolve has ever fled from the foe.

items.name: Razor Standard
items.description: Armour Bane(-2)
items.story: Hung with hundreds of wickedly sharp blades, an air of sharpness radiates outwards from the Razor Standard

items.name: Rampaging Banner
items.description: Re-roll charge role
items.story: As a matter of honour, those that fight beneath the Rampaging Banner are always first into the fray.

items.name: The Blazing Banner
items.description: Flaming Attacks
items.story: An eternal flame flickers about the weapons of those that march beneath the Blazing Banner

items.name: War Banner
items.description: +1 combat result
items.story: A proud banner of great age. Those that march beneath the War Banner fight with grim resolve.

items.name: Wizarding Hat
items.description: Lvl 1 wizard. Subject to Stupidity.
items.story: This splendid hat, once the property of a long dead Wizard, is still haunted by their ghost.

items.name: Flying Carpet
items.description: 'Regular|Heavy infantry only. Fly (8) and Swiftstride special rules. Can not join unit.
items.story: Woven from the finest silk in a far-off land, this splendid rug does more than warm the feet!

items.name: Healing Potion
items.description: Single Use. Recover D3 wounds.
items.story: Purveyors of magical potions make many bold claims. Sometimes they are true, sometimes not.

items.name: Ruby Ring of Ruin
items.description: Cast Fireball. Bound spell Power Level 2.
items.story: Uttering a simple command, the wearer of the ring can hurl a flaming ball of ruin at their foes.

items.name: Potion of Strength
items.description: Single Use. +D3 Strength.
items.story: A concoction of strength-giving vegetables and roots, mixed together with a touch of magic.

items.name: Potion of Toughness
items.description: Single Use. +D3 Toughness.
items.story: Distilled by magical means, this potion is sure to make the drinker all but invulnerable.

items.name: Potion of Speed
items.description: Single Use. +D3 Initiative.
items.story: A powerful potion with terrible aftertaste that sharpens the wits and speeds the reactions.

items.name: Potion of Foolhardiness
items.description: Single Use. Immune to Psychology.
items.story: A magical brew that fills the drinker with courage... it may actually just be strong liquor.

items.name: Feedback Scroll
items.description: Single Use. Once opposing spell resolved, 2D6 each 4+ opposing wizard loses wound.
items.story: When read aloud, the charm causes aetheric energy to floob back towards the enemy Wizard.

items.name: Scroll of Transmogrification
items.description: Single Use. D6 lower than wizard level then turn into frog. See Rulebook for full rules. It's complicated...
items.story: For a wizard, there are few things better than the rush of joy felt upon turning a rival into a frog!

items.name: Wand of Jet
items.description: +1 casting|dispel rolls. Natural double item destroyed.
items.story: Carved from brittle jet, this wand refines a Wizard's power, but is easily broken.

items.name: Lore Familiar
items.description: Choose spells
items.story: By creating a magical homunculus, a Wizard is able to better recall forgotten details of their studies.

items.name: Power Scroll
items.description: Single Use. Extra D6 for casting roll. Double 1 spell is miscast.
items.story: Unfurling a scroll bearing runes of power can greatly increase the spell's power.

items.name: Dispel Scroll
items.description: Single Use. Extra D6 for dispel roll. Double 1 wizard is outclassed.
items.story: The Wizard reads aloud a charm of unbinding from an enchanted scroll.

items.name: Arcane Familiar
items.description: Know spells from two Lores of Magic. See rulebook for more details.
items.story: Many Wizards are accompanied by familiars gifted with arcane knowledge. These creatures constantly whisper secrets to their master.

items.name: Earthing Rod
items.description: Single Use. Re-roll Miscast Table.
items.story: Inert metal runs the length of the Wizard's staff, drawing magical overloads safely into the earth.

items.name: Primeval Club
items.description: Str = LD, AP -3 (Hatred(Empire), Magical Attacks, Poisoned Attacks)
items.story: This ancient club, bound in cracked leather and infested with spiders and slugs, has been stained red with blood since the dawn of civilization and is the bane of all order and hope.

items.name: Axe of Men
items.description: AP -1 (Killing Blow, Magical Attacks) - If bearer kills an enemy character (including champions) in a challenge, gain Terror.
items.story: A single, mighty stroke from this fearsome axe can cut even the most powerful warrior clean in half, a sight which emboldens the bearer's followers and horrifies their enemies in equal measure.

items.name: Mangelder
items.description: S+1 AP -1 (Magical Attacks, Terror) - Any enemy unit that suffers one or more wounds suffers -1 to its Leadership.
items.story: The Mangelder saps the strength of its victim's minds as well as their bodies, and those few who survive wounds inflicted by the weapon rarely fight alone.

items.name: Hunter's Spear
items.description: Shoots like a bolt thrower. 24" S6 AP -3 (Cumbersome, Magical Attacks, Multiple Wounds(2), Through & Through).
items.story: Crafted to fell the mighty beasts of the far north, this thick-hafted spear bears enchantments allowing it to penetrate yards of flesh and muscle, skewering the foew through-and-through.

items.name: Pelt of the Dark Young
items.description: +1 Sv. Magic Resistance (-2). May be worn with other armour.
items.story: The Pelt of Dark Young is shrouded in tendrils of darkness that gather about the wearer.

items.name: The Blackened Plate
items.description: Full Plate Armour. 3+ Ward Sv from Flaming Attacks.
items.story: The battered suit of plate mail is blacked with the soot of burning palaces and temple.

items.name: Rune of the True Beast
items.description: Troop Type 'Monster' suffer -1 to WS within 6" of bearer.
items.story: The sigil of pure savagery is carved into the flesh of only the mightiest Beastlords, causing even the greatest of monsters to cower before the unbridled ferocity of this raging predator.

items.name: Dark Heart
items.description: Single Use. Recover one lost wound.
items.story: Beastmen rip out the still beating hearts from their defeated rivals. In battle, they will feed upon these grisly trophies, claiming the strength of their vanquished enemies.

items.name: Totem of Rust
items.description: Every model (friend or foe) within 6" -1 Armour Save.
items.story: Little more than a jagged spike upon which the corroded remains of armoured warriors are impaled, the Totem of Rust spreads an all-consuming aura of entropy.

items.name: Manbane Standard
items.description: Enemies within 6" -1 Ld.
items.story: The Manbane Standard is a corpse beset by carrion birds. Any who behold it are filled with the dread that it will be upon their eyes that the birds next feast.

items.name: Vitriolic Totem
items.description: Unit gains Poisoned Attacks.
items.story: This gnarled and twisted bough is hung with the heads of the fallen. From these rotted trophies drips a constant rain of blacked ichor and poisoned blood.

items.name: Banner of Outrage
items.description: Re-roll Leadership for Primal Fury.
items.story: This stolen standard has been befouled and stained as a terrible affront to the enemy. Its presence drives Beastmen to ever more vile extremes of savagery.

items.name: Stone of Spite
items.description: Single Use. -2 modifier to Wizard Casting level. Use in Command sub-phase.
items.story: Contained within this glowing stone is the soul of an Ungor, slain in a hidious ritual. When crushed underhoof, a wave of bitterness and spite is released, banished the Winds of Magic.

items.name: Heart of the First Beast
items.description: Unless fleeing, any friendly units within 18" may use Leadership for Primal Fury.
items.story: This immeasurably ancient, fossilised horn is said to be taken from the skull of the First Beast. When it is sounded, Beastmen find the savage fury of their race swelling within their hearts.

items.name: Skin of Man
items.description: Beastmen Chieftains/Shamans who are 'infantry'. Gain Scouts|Vanguard special rule.
items.story: The wearer of this flayed and sigil-encrusted human pelt is under a glamour, making them appear no more than a particularly ugly peasant. When the skin is cast aside, the aweful truth is revealed.

items.name: The Plague Chalice
items.description: Natural doubles spell is cast as perfect invocation. Each perfect invocation suffer Str 4 hit no armour save.
items.story: This rotted wooden chalice is filled with a vile brew of blood and pus. Any Shaman that sups from it is wracked with pain, even as raw magic courses through their veins.

items.name: Hagtree Fetish
items.description: Magic Missile spells re-roll failed to Wound.
items.story: A crudely carved effigy of a hagtree, this shamanic heirloom can spell doom for the Bray-Shaman's foe when brandished with the appropriate curse.

items.name: Jagged Dagger
items.description: Sacrifice unit model to add casting value per wound. See rulebook for more details.
items.story: This potent sacrificial tool radiates the pain and anger of a thousand ritual offerings made to the Runious Powers.

possible_values.description: -1 To Hit
possible_values.story: The grotesque gift of the Chaos Gods, causes the recipient's skin to constantly ooze with a vile, foul smelling slime.

possible_values.description: Characters only. Gains Stubborn.
possible_values.story: A Beastmen that sprouts an excessively sharp, large or twisted set of horns is supremely confident in their position at the pinnacle of the Warherd, so obvious are the Dark God's blessings.

possible_values.description: +1 Str
possible_values.story: The Beastmen has been blessed by the Gods of Chaos, and its torso bulges with huge muscles.

possible_values.description: Characters only. -1 to hit from shooting attacks.
possible_values.story: The Beastman's pelt exudes clouds of smokey darkness, hiding them from the eyes of the enemy.

possible_values.description: AP -1 with any weapon used by model
possible_values.story: This Beastman's lower incisors have grown into sharp or excessively large tusks with which they gouge savage wounds into the flesh of their enemies.

possible_values.description: Beastmen Chieftains only. +1 Ld within command range.
possible_values.story: The Beastman's horns have twisted into semblance of a potent daemonic rune. This promise of ascendency to the ranks of Daemonhood fills its followers with courage.

possible_values.description: +1 Attack as ordinary weapon.
possible_values.story: Some Beastman grow additional arms, allowing them to unleash even more carnage upon the battlefield.

possible_values.description: Infantry only. Gains Armoured Hide(1).
+1 Initiative
possible_values.story: The Dark Gods gift some Beastman with acute senses, additional eyes or even extra heads, granting them unnaturally fast reactions.
